articlesectionclassifier.beans
Class ClassificationResult

java.lang.Object
  articlesectionclassifier.beans.ClassificationResult

public class ClassificationResult
extends java.lang.Object

A bean object that holds data provided by the ArticleSectionClassifier after classification.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String BY_BAYESIAN
          A static field used to represent text classification by the Bayesian method.
static java.lang.String BY_TITLE
          A static field used to represent text classification by the title recognition method.
static java.lang.String NO_CLASSIFICATION
          A static field used to represent text classification when it has produced an error or has not been possible.

classificationMethod -

getAllLikelihoods

public java.util.LinkedList<StringValuePair> getAllLikelihoods()
Returns:
Returns the log likelihoods of the text submitted being present in any of the four standard article section as a LinkedList of StringValuePairs.

getClassifiedAs

public java.lang.String getClassifiedAs()
Returns:
Returns the section type that the text was classified as being most likely to belong to. The result will correspond to one of the ENUMs in TitleData.

getLogLikelihood

public double getLogLikelihood()
Returns:
Returns the log likelihood of the submitted text being from the section type returned by getClassifiedAs().

getTextThatWasClassified

public java.lang.String getTextThatWasClassified()
Returns:
Returns the originally submitted text
